attributes.action: repeal the recent laws regarding the compulsory usage of booster seats for children under 12 years old and under 135cm tall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This law is crazy. People are not killed by sitting in badly-suited seats, they are killed by irresponsible and careless drivers and the fines you can receive for not complying to this foolish legislation is ridiculous. Sign this petition and stop another stealth tax!
